snippet.title: TOP 5 CELEBRITIES DEFENDING JOHNNY DEPP AGAINST AMBER HEARD
snippet.description:
TOP 5 CELEBRITIES DEFENDING JOHNNY DEPP AGAINST AMBER HEARD. The Johnny Depp and amber heard court saga has turned into a major plot where other celebs publicly defend Johnny Depp. The latest celebrity news reports jk rowling on amber heard, Jason Momoa on amber heard, and alternatively, Elon musk on amber heard and others are celebrities that defended Johnny Depp. Although in some celebrity news, the court hearing and evidence provided seems to be already turning against amber heard and all that is left is for that judge to rule in favor of that umbrella guy Johnny Depp which is why some celebrities as joined in to publicly defend Johnny Depp from their verified social media accounts. However, rumors on Angelina Jolie and Johnny Depp's dating surface in heard and deep court saga.

For the last five years, Johnny Depp has been at the mercy of domestic violence allegations from his ex-wife, Amber Heard, all of which he denies vehemently. With the world canceling Captain Jack Sparrow, who is defending him? We shall be looking at a list of celebrities who have spoken out in Depp’s defense. 
Before we give you our Top 5 list, we have to give special mentions to other celebrities like Penelope Cruz, who talked about Johnny's kindness and friendship, especially when pregnant. She called him talented, kind, and with a peculiar sense of humor. Her husband, actor Javier Bardem, also added that Johnny has always exhibited true caring kindness, which is why he stands by him. He said that even though toxic people have trapped Johnny in lies, he is still smiling. Sia also declared her support for him after hearing the tapes in evidence. She said that she wished Johnny would stay clean from substance abuse, but she publicly supports him. Pirates of the Caribbean star Kevin McNally even went steps ahead to declare extra support for his co-star by offering to leave the franchise if Johnny had to leave too. He said that his fate is tied to Johnny's, and if he were indeed going, Kevin would go too. Paul Bettany, Johnny’s co-star in Mortdecai, Transcendence, and The tourist, and good friend, said that knowing Johnny for years, he was the gentlest, sweetest, and the kindest man he had ever known. Now here are the Top 5 celebrities defending Johnny Depp against Amber Heard. 

Timestamps
00:00 Introduction
01:36 5. WINONA RYDER
02:38 4. VANESSA PARADIS
03:36 3. J. K. ROWLING
04:40 2. DAVID YATES
05:35 1. SHARON OSBORNE

# jkrowlingonamberheard #celebspubliclydefendingjohnnydepp #angelinajoliejohnnydepp #elonmuskonamberheard #CashCowMakers
tags: j k rowling on amber heard
